head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Queens: Man Charged With Murder

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Queens: Man Charged With Murder

body.head.byline: By Jed Stevenson (NYT); Compiled by Anthony Ramirez

block.p: Police arrested a man last night and charged him with second-degree murder in the shooting death of his mother-in-law in her Queens home on Monday afternoon. Olga Prince, 71, died from a single gunshot wound to the head. The police discovered the body at the entrance to her kitchen with a handgun lying beside her, and charged Sydney Sampson, 54. Officers had previously responded to complaints of loud arguments in the house eight times in the last year, most recently on Friday, the police said.

Officers had previously responded to complaints of loud arguments in the house eight times in the last year, most recently on Friday, the police said.
